page.title: 07Battle Road, St.Leonards
page.content: In Battle Road there are quite a few different types of{local shops}such as a small supermarket called Londis,two bakeries, a bookies, post office, a stationers card shop, a pet shop, two hairdressers,a chemist,a sweet shop and an off licence. You can buy all your everyday shopping and get quite a choice. People who work here are very helpful and understanding.There is a library open four and a half days a week,which a lot of people use.The two garages,Esso and Amoco,sell petrol at Â£2.04 a gallon, and repair cars. The shops are very busy, especially Saturdays and morning times. There is also a Clinic and School Dental place. Here are some{July 1985 prices. Sliced loaf of bread 40p Pint of milk 24p 250g.butter 50p First class stamp 17p.
